rows.label: tlk41100152_03_msg0001
rows.name:
You helped my older brother,
right? Thank you!

rows.label: tlk41100152_03_msg0002
rows.name: Thanks for helping my older brother!

rows.label: tlk41100152_03_msg0003
rows.name: Thanks to you, we brothers can live together again!

rows.label: tlk41100152_03_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm so happy that Dad
came back...

rows.label: tlk41100152_03_msg0005
rows.name:
It's fun playing the game my older brother
sent us together!

rows.label: tlk41100152_03_msg0006
rows.name:
Dad's not back yet... I want to play
the game my older brother sent us
together...

rows.label: tlk41100152_03_msg0007
rows.name:
My brother said Dad did something bad,
so he won't be back for a long time...

rows.label: tlk41100152_03_msg0008
rows.name:
But even if it takes decades,
I'll make sure that wish comes true...
